name: Quantum Chaos (Prototype)
description:
**PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS IS A PROTOTYPE FOR AN IDEA THAT MAY COME TO PASS IF GIVEN ENOUGH SUPPORT**

Burn some rubber and take control of an infamous taxi as you cruise through the streets of Jozi in this Spiritual Successor to Taxi Tourists!

This Prototype was created during the ITTHYNK Gaming Solutions Game Jam during a 1 week period.

We are considering expanding this project in the future, so please leave some comments telling us how you feel about the game and what direction the full project should go into?

Controls:
W - Accelerate, S - Reverse/Brake, A/D - Steer, Left Shift - Boost, Space bar - Jump, R - Restart

Developed by: 

Vedanth Panchoo, Athi Musoke, Jerome Chetty and Lesedi Mochadibane
